languages.text: "Да, точно! Мы можем рассказать, куда точно ходить не стоит. Или объяснить, как добраться до нашего убежища".

traits.locale_text: "Да, точно! Мы можем рассказать, куда точно ходить не стоит. Или объяснить, как добраться до нашего убежища".
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."
languages.original_text: "Да, точно! Мы можем рассказать, куда точно ходить не стоит. Или объяснить, как добраться до нашего убежища".

traits.locale_text: "That's right! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain the way into our shelter."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "That's right! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain the way into our shelter."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "That's right! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: "That's right! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: “没错！我们可以告诉你哪些地方绝对不能去。或者，我们也可以告诉你我们的避难所在什么地方。”
languages.original_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: “没错！我们可以告诉你哪些地方绝对不能去。或者，我们也可以告诉你我们的避难所在什么地方。”
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: «¡Eso es! Podemos decirle qué sitios evitar. O explicarle cómo llegar a nuestro refugio».
languages.original_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso es! Podemos decirle qué sitios evitar. O explicarle cómo llegar a nuestro refugio».
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: 「それがいい！行ったら絶対にまずい場所を教えられます。私たちのシェルターへの行き方をご説明することも」
languages.original_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: 「それがいい！行ったら絶対にまずい場所を教えられます。私たちのシェルターへの行き方をご説明することも」
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: « Oui, voilà ! On peut vous indiquer les endroits à éviter ou vous expliquer comment accéder à notre abri. »
languages.original_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, voilà ! On peut vous indiquer les endroits à éviter ou vous expliquer comment accéder à notre abri. »
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "Genau! Wir können Euch sagen, wo Ihr auf keinen Fall hingehen solltet. Oder erklären, wie Ihr zu unserer Zuflucht gelangt."
languages.original_text: "That's it! We can tell where you definitely mustn't go. Or we can explain how to get to our shelter."

traits.locale_text: "Genau! Wir können Euch sagen, wo Ihr auf keinen Fall hingehen solltet. Oder erklären, wie Ihr zu unserer Zuflucht gelangt."
traits.speaker: Prisoner
